item.title: Star Wars Musical Ecology
item.description: Introduction Star Wars Oxygen Species diversity Star Wars musical ecology The data Analysis Clustering Jostâ€™s D NMDS Conclusions Introduction Star Wars Oxygen I love Star Wars. I love the story telling and fantasy, but I especially love the music. John Williams is amazing. There was a podcast out there called Star Wars Oxygen that covered the music of Star Wars and it was one of my favorite podcasts of all time.

item.title: About me
item.description: This is the rarely updated blog of Chris Hamm, artisinal data stylist for the Monsanto Company. This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
